Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:37:59 UTC – Details)



7 in1 Edge Trimming Squeegee: The squeegee set has 14 ends with different shapes, which fit for any edge of your car, such as headlight, Bumper, car doors handle, Car center-console. CARTINTS brand edge trimming squeegee will help you complete vinyl film wrapping in narrow corners.
4 Inches Felt Edge Squeegee: Made of soft plastic, strong enough to improve the efficiency of smoothing vinyl film. Microfiber felt edge squeegee will not leave any scratches or marks on the thin self-adhesive paper.
Vinyl Wrap Cutter And 9mm Knife Blade: The razor cutter is safe enough for you to cut off vinyl film roll because its blade is hidden inside. The retractable 9 mm knife is the best to trim the excess vinyl film or cut the size you want. Snap off blade will miantain long time best cutting performance.
Vinyl Wrap Magnets and Work Gloves: You can use the vinyl magnet tool to hold the large vinyl film paper so that you can free your hands to finish the details from smoothing to trimming.Work gloves is the key tool to prevent hands injury, or the damages of vinyl wrap paper.
Package: 7 x blue hard edge-trimming squeegee, 2x blue felt squeegee, 2 x vinyl wrap magnet holder,1 x 9mm utility knife,10 x blades,5 x squeegee felts replacement,1 x safe red cutter, 1x black work gloves

BIG Button Phone – Packard Bell creates goods for everyone, including senior citizens. We work hard to ensure our product is 100% all the time, keeping the family safe we manufactured a big button phone for your parents and grandparents so they can make calls and receive calls at ease.
Speed Dial – With just one touch of a button you can call your loved ones, set up to 10 people on speed dial and always have the most important people just one click away
Enhanced Speaker Phone – For those who are hard of hearing you can now hear everything loud and clear. The big button phone has a speaker enhancing the call volume for those who are hard of hearing.
Works in Power Outage – The Big button phone will always be there for you, no matter the weather or any electricity problems the phone will remain on and ready to call allowing you to tell your family you’re safe.
Excellent Care – Packard Bell takes responsibility of all quality-related issues. Please feel free to contact our customer support team when you have any question, and you can be sure of our prompt response.

Price: $27.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:42:50 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Games the Family Will Love

At Brybelly we love games, and we love to share games. Build better family game nights with beloved classics and fun new titles.

Shop Favorites & New Launches

How did we get our start?

In 2005 Brybelly was founded like all great companies: in a garage. What began as selling poker chips at flea markets has become a medium-sized Indiana business employing nearly 50 hoosiers.

What makes our products unique?

A Brybelly game tries to pack in extra value. If there’s a similar product, we want to include more stuff. If it’s a familiar game, we want to add fun extra rules for more replay value. If a deck of cards is all you need to play a game, we want to make that deck special.

Why do we love what we do?

Games are fun! And we think that fun can be contagious.

Old Favorites with Flair

Classic Games Given New Life

Games from Across the Globe

Looking for even more? We’ve probably got it! We’re always adding new and exciting games and experiences to our growing catalog.

Whether its board games, card games, dice games, even favorite casino games, gaming is our passion and we’re always looking to share with you our next big new thing. So keep your peepers peeled!

SHOOT THE POOP! Get wild with Shoot the Poop, a hilarious game for the whole family and makes perfect white elephant gifts for adults
NO PLUMBING REQUIRED: Includes a talking Tank the Toilet who’s flush with funny jokes, 12 plastic poop toys, and 2 launchers
POWER POOPER: This wild family game requires 2 AAA batteries to help Tank make crazy flushing sounds
THE FAMILY THAT POOPS TOGETHER: Enjoy some family toilet humor! Shoot the Poop is a great for 2 players kids games ages 4-8, 8-12+
HANDFUL OF POOP: Get launching with a fast-paced family dexterity game. Don’t get caught with your hands full of poo! Be the first to shoot your shot, and don’t forget to flush

Have a Poopy Day

Hi folks, meet Tank! He’s the talking toilet who loves to play. It’s up to you and one other player to get your fun flingers and form a doo-doo duo! Be the first player to launch all six of your poopy projectiles into Tank’s mouth. Powered by two AAA batteries, Tank will cheer you on as you take aim, ready, and fire away! This family dexterity game helps children develop fine motor skills, and it’s finished in a flash. Sink your last floater and win the game! Don’t forget to flush! When you pull Tank’s lever, he’ll always have something to say.

Read more

Why You’ll Love It

Shoot the Poop is a fast-playing game of reflex and humor. Play with 1 child or friend for some fun and a little bit of toilet humor. Age 5+, 2 players. Great for Christmas and White Elephant gifts and Birthday Presents from that crazy uncle.

Read more



Don’t Be a Donkey!
Cat-Tasrophe!
Irr-Elephant!
Honeycomb Hacov!
Looking for more family-friendly games from Brybelly? HEE-HAW! No pins, tails, or blindfolds required for this refreshing donkey game! Me-WOW! Save the kitty cat from the top of the tree in this classic and challenging kids dexterity game! More than an Earful! Place the platform, put the elephant in the right place, and try to keep it balanced! Sticky Situation! Use your paws to poke out pieces of honeycombs, snatching up delicious gobs of honey to munch for lunch!

FOR ALL PUPS AND POOPS: Extra long, extra strong bags to accommodate any size poop. These bags are designed to fit our included dispenser, or any standard sized dispenser like a glove.
MORE BAGS, MORE WAGS: A whopping 900 poop bags (60 rolls x 15 bags each) plus 1 Earth Rated dispenser. Because there’s no such thing as too many poop bags.
GIVING BACK SINCE 2009: Your purchase from Earth Rated helps support animal shelters, rescues & non-profit organizations. As a B Corporation, making things better, for dogs and people, is the reason we’re excited to come to work each day.

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:28:05 UTC – Details)


Select a favorite Monopoly token, place it on Go and roll the dice to own it all! This edition of the family board game includes 16 Community Chest cards voted on by fans…did your favorite make it in? This edition features classic Monopoly gameplay: it’s all about buying, selling, and trading properties to win. Chance or Community cards can be a game changer. Will they make a player richer — or send someone to Jail? Looking for games for Family Game Night? The Monopoly game is a Family Game Night favorite, and it’s a fun indoor activity for kids. The Hasbro Gaming and Monopoly names and logos, the distinctive design of the gameboard, the four corner squares, the Mr. Monopoly name and character, as well as each of the distinctive elements of the board and playing pieces are trademarks of Hasbro.
FAST-DEALING PROPERTY TRADING GAME: It’s a Family Game Night staple! Players buy, sell, dream and scheme their way to riches with the Monopoly board game
COMMUNITY CHEST CARDS: Fans voted for cards they’d like to see, and the votes are in! This edition includes 16 winning cards, each reflecting some great things about being part of a community
PLAYERS BUY, SELL AND TRADE TO WIN: Players buy out neighborhoods, sell properties, charge rent, and grow an empire in the Monopoly Game for adults and kids age 8 and up
BUILD HOUSES AND HOTELS: Love that feeling when an opponent lands on an owned property? In this family board game, the more players build, the more rent money they can collect. Cha-ching
WHAT’S YOUR TOKEN?: Tokens include Rubber Ducky, T-Rex, Penguin, Hazel, Scottie, Racecar, Hat, and Battleship. It’s a great game for Family Game Night, or anytime indoor fun

5
Price: $21.99 - $13.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:28:05 UTC – Details)

JUMPHIGH Gardening Tools Set

Enjoy gardening time and relaxing life.

Gardening Gifts Set

4 Pairs Garden Gloves Women

Gardening Gloves for Women

Floral Gardening Tools Set

Gardening Tools Macaron Green

JUMPHIGH established the light garden tools set since 2018. It’s very popular as a gardening gift. We deeply know that product quality is very important to enhance user experience. We focused on the quality of garden tools and continued to develop several heavy duty gardening tools set with superior quality and pretty exterior. We aim to provide beautiful and practical gardening tools to more customer and make gardening work more enjoyable.

Purple Garden Tools Set

For light gardening work.

Perfect for gardening gifts.

✿ Essential Gardening Set ✿ – 7 piece garden hand tools kit includes trowel, transplanter, hand rake, cultivator, weeder, pruning shears and a multi-compartment tote to organize different kinds of hand tools and gardening necessities.
✿ Heavy Duty Garden Hand Tools ✿ – The hand tools are made of rust-resistant aluminum alloy, sturdy and durable. The stainless steel pruner with safety lock to ensure safe use. The soft-rubber, no-slip grip handle is ergonomically designed to relieve stress on the wrists, meet the highest standards in comfort for your hands.
✿ Multifunctional ✿ – Perfect for a variety of tasks including digging, weeding, raking, loosening soil, aerating, transplanting and pruning to meet all your requirements for indoor and outdoor gardening. Using these garden hand tools, just begin your gardening hobbies to grow vegetables, plants, flowers, spices and whatever you like.
✿ Practical Garden Organizer Bag ✿ – The hand bag is made of high-quality cotton and polyester for durability and easy cleaning. The large capacity main bag with 8 convenient side pockets for easy access to carry your accessories during indoor or outdoor planting. It also has elastic loops to help keep tools in place.
✿ Great Gardening Gifts ✿ – Efficient, durable, and professional, this 7 piece gardening tools set makes a perfect gift for gardening lover, both men and women, a great gift for birthday, holidays, Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, Thanksgiving and Christmas.

Our Customers asked and Free Signal TV has delivered! The next generation of mobile 12V DC powered high-definition televisions have arrived, featuring built-in Smart TV features that campers, boaters and tailgaters have been asking for! The Transit Platinum 12 Volt TV line offers 22”, 28”, 32” and 40” high-definition 1080p LED screen sizes with built in Wifi/Internet connectivity and other cutting-edge features like ultra-low power draw, integrated SD-DVD player, easy Bluetooth connectivity, popular apps like Netflix, Amazon Prime, YouTube and many more. Engineered for long lasting mobile use with vibration resistant chassis and durable 1080p high resolution LED screen. Standard home use televisions don’t last in a mobile environment – and the Transit Platinum models feature unique “Flex-Environment” engineering which allows reliable operation across a wide range of temperatures and humidities for reliable use in demanding environments. Manufactured to Free Signal TV’s rigid quality control standards and backed by a one-year free replacement warranty – an industry first that debuted with the original Transit 12 DC powered TV line. Easy set up and operation, includes 110V optional powerbrick, 12V car charger outlet cord, multi-function “one-key command” remote, and detailed user manual. Supported by Free Signal TV’s top-rated domestic-based Customer Care and Tech Support Teams for assistance with questions and customized set-up applications. Experience the enjoyment, performance and peace of mind that only Free Signal TV’s unique Advanced Entertainment Solutions can deliver!
Built in Wifi/Internet Access, Bluetooth Connectivity, Integrated SD – DVD Player.
Preloaded Popular Apps (Netflix, Amazon Prime, YouTube, Pandora & More).
Rugged Vibration Resistant Chassis for Trouble-Free Mobile/Off Road Use.
High-Definition Screen Sizes from 22” to 40”. “Flex-Environment” Engineering – Temperature and Humidity Adaptable.

Product Description

This is the most cost-effective product in the DIY class after many R&D and design configurations.

It is a wonderful companion for manual work.

This set of products includes everything you need. It is a must in your home garage. Standard and precision screwdrivers used to handle various sizes of work, it can effectively help you complete large and small tasks.Whether you are a mechanic or a DIY enthusiast, this set of products can accompany you for a long time and is a very practical and cost-effective partner. At the same time, it is also a great gift-giving option. Give it to husband, father, teacher, brother, and of course to female mechanics, including any DIY enthusiast. Anyone who receives this product will have nothing but praise.

21-PIECE MAGNETIC SCREWDRIVERS

SLOTTED screwdriver: SL3 x 3″, SL4 x 3″, SL5 x 4″, SL6 x 4″, SL6 x 5″, SL6 x 6″, SL8 x 6″PHILLIPS screwdriver: PH0 x 3″, PH1 x 3″, PH2 x 4″, PH2 x 5″, PH2 x 6″, PH3 x 6″TORX screwdriver: T15 x 3″, T20 x 3″, T25 x 4″, T30 x 4″SQUARE screwdriver: S0 x 3″, S1 x 3″, S2 x 4″POZI screwdriver: PZ0 x 3″

4-PIECE PICK & HOOKS

90-degree hook

Straight hook

Full hook

Angle hook pick

8-PIECE PRECISION SCREWDRIVERS

SLOTTED: SL2.5 x 50mm, SL3.0 x 50mmPHILLIPS: PH00 x 50mm, PH0 x 50mmTORX: T6 x 50mm, T7 x 50mm, T8 x 50mm, T10 x 50mm

16-PIECE Metric and SAE HEX KEY

METRIC: 1.5mm, 2mm, 2.5mm, 3mm, 4mm, 5mm, 5.5mm, 6mmSAE: 1/16, 5/64, 3/32, 1/8, 5/32, 3/16, 7/32, 1/4 inch

60-PIECE SCREWDRIVERS BITS & 1PC RATCHET DRIVER HANDLE

TORX: T8, T9, T10, T15, T20, T25, T27, T30, T35, T40SLOTTED: SL2, SL3, SL3.5, SL4, SL4.5, SL5, SL5.5, SL6, SL6.5, SL7POZI: PZ0, PZ0 ,PZ1, PZ1, PZ2, PZ2, PZ2, PZ3, PZ3, PZ3SQUARE: S0, S0, S1, S1, S2, S2, S2, S3, S3, S3PHILLIPS: PH0, PH0, PH1, PH1, PH2, PH2, PH2, PH3, PH3, PH3HEX: H1.5, H2, H2.5, H3, H3.5, H4, H4.5, H5, H5.5, H6

18-PIECE SOCKET

SAE: 3/16″, 1/4″, 9/32″, 5/16″, 11/32″, 3/8″, 7/16″, 15/32″, 1/2″

ADDITIONAL ACCESSORIES
